description: Retrieve all container image repositories available in your project

data.description: Data is the array of repository items

id.description: ID is the unique identifier for this repository (repository name with slashes replaced by "___")

object.description: Object is the type identifier for this response (always "image-repository")

url.description: URL is the full registry URL for this repository (e.g., "registry.together.ai/project-id/repository-name")

object.description: Object is the type identifier for this response (always "list")

summary: Get the list of image repositories in your project
